details.description:
Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

details.description:
Introducing a brand new luxury building located in the charming Vinegar Hill area of DUMBO! Indulge in breathtaking views spanning both the Manhattan Bridge and Brooklyn Bridge. Immerse yourself in the abundance of nearby parks, including John St Park, Main St Park, Trinity Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Cadman Plaza Park, Whitman Park, and many more. Delight in the long-established, delectable local restaurants such as Bridge Coffee, while still satisfying those late-night cravings at spots we all secretly adore (*cough Shake Shack), just a few blocks away. Experience the perfect blend of old-school Brooklyn charm and modern luxury living, and prepare to fall in love with your new home here.
Convenience is key, as the building is conveniently located near the A, C, and F trains, as well as the B57, B62, and B69 bus routes.
Unit Features: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen with Dishwasher; Microwave Central A/C; Heat Private Balconies available upon inquiry In-unit laundry available upon inquiry
Building Features: Rooftop Deck Laundry Room Fitness Center Recreation Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Bike Storage Pets Allowed First; Security deposit required No broker fee!
Come and experience the epitome of luxury living in this exceptional new building. Don't miss out on this opportunity to make it your new home.

details.description:
? One Fifty Lawrence ? Elevated Living in the Heart of Downtown Brooklyn
Welcome to One Fifty Lawrence, a modern 25-story tower redefining Brooklyn living. Nestled between Fulton and Willoughby Streets, this striking new residence blends refined design, thoughtful amenities, and unbeatable convenience ? just steps from the Jay St?MetroTech subway hub.
Inside, discover bright studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartments with expansive windows, high ceilings, and sleek finishes. Each home is crafted for comfort and style, featuring top-of-the-line appliances, in-unit laundry, and energy-efficient systems.
Residents enjoy access to an impressive amenity collection: a state-of-the-art fitness center, rooftop terrace with sweeping skyline views, resident lounge, and co-working spaces ? all within a pet-friendly community.
At One Fifty Lawrence, you?re surrounded by everything Downtown Brooklyn offers ? premier shopping, dining, and cultural destinations ? while being minutes from Manhattan and the rest of the borough.
Modern design. Urban energy. Unmatched convenience. This is One Fifty Lawrence.

details.description:
----- Luxury 2 bedroom 1bath, available now ------
Housed in what was formerly known as the Empire State Dairy Company, The Highland is one of Brooklyn?s most recent landmarked buildings. Steeped in rich history, The residence now spans 14 stories and offers Studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom homes.
Our units feature ? Modern Elegant Kitchens ? Quartz Countertops ? Stainless Steel Appliances ? Panelized Dishwashers ? In-unit washer/dryer ? Floor- to- ceiling windows ? White Oak Flooring ? Mini split heating/cooling system
Bathroom features include ? White Oak Vanities ? Floor-to-ceiling grooved ceramic wall tiles ? Deep soaking tub ? Stone style floor tiles
Our building features ? Laundry room ? Bike Storage ? Resident Lounge ? Business Center ? Kids Playroom ? Fitness Center ? Rooftop Lounge ? Two Outdoor Terraces
Located just south of Highland Park, Cypress Hills is home to passionate individuals who share a strong appreciation for their neighborhood due to its rich and vibrant history, local bars, restaurants, and cafes, and community gardens, parks, and green spaces. Boasting 101 acres, Highland Park is situated on a high plateau and offers stunning views of the Ridgewood Reservoir, Rockaways, and Atlantic Ocean. Additional parks and green spaces include Shirley Chisholm State Park, Hamilton Beach Park, Sperandeo Brothers Playground, the Herbal Garden of East New York, George Walker Jr. Park, Martin Luther King Jr. Playground, Grace Playground, Noakhali Cricket Field, and Sutter Ballfields.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Central A/C, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances

Introducing the Winslow, Astoria?s latest gem and waterfront marvel nestled in the charming Hallets Point neighborhood of Queens
This boutique tower stands as a testament to modern luxury, offering an unparalleled living experience with breathtaking views of both the tranquil waterfront and the iconic New York City skyline. Located in close proximity to buses and the ferry, the Winslow provides convenient access to transportation, ensuring that residents can easily explore the vibrant city beyond. The Winslow sets itself apart with its thoughtfully designed units, boasting spacious layouts, expansive windows, and private balconies in most residences. Revel in the beauty of these homes, featuring meticulously crafted kitchens with high-end appliances and elegantly tiled bathrooms. Each detail has been carefully curated to create a harmonious living space that combines comfort and sophistication.
This premier waterfront tower not only offers stunning residences but also an array of exceptional amenities. Residents can take advantage of convenient parking, secure bike storage, and a dedicated package room. The Winslow goes above and beyond with additional features like a well-equipped gym, game room, and business lounge. The rooftop, adorned with picturesque views and grilling stations, provides the perfect setting for social gatherings. With balconies in most units and a majority enjoying water views, the Winslow promises a lifestyle of tranquility and luxury. As the newest addition to Astoria, a neighborhood known for its proximity to Manhattan coupled with its serene ambiance, the Winslow stands out as a haven of modern living in the heart of the city.
